entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You disabled some malfunctioning battle droids that jettisoned themselves to Tatooine outside of Mos Eisley. Thankfully, the droids didn't hurt anyone.
entries.journal_entry_description: Some battle droids landed in an escape pod near Mos Eisley. They are behaving erratically. Go disable them before they harm someone.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Some malfunctioning battle droids accidentally jettisoned themselves from a starship in an escape pod, and that pod landed not far from Mos Eisley. Go disable those battle droids before they cause more trouble.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Peawp R'dawc and let her know you disabled the error-prone droids.
